document_data.mainbody:
Huang was a Dawnbringer of Lathander from the city Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Lady Firelia Jannath hired Dawnbringer Huang to exorcise the restless spirit that took possession of her husband, Oskar Fevras. Huang was unable to fulfill the promise and recommended Lady Jannath to hire a priest of Sel√ªne instead.
